mean_cn: adj. 豪华的，浮华的，炫耀的，华丽的
mean_en: having or showing the attitude of people who speak and behave in a very formal and serious way because they believe that they are better, smarter, or more important than other people
word_etyma: pomp敏捷的+ous形容词后缀 →壮丽的
sentence: This pompous actor pays no attention to her fans.
sentence_trans: 这个自大的演员对她的粉丝毫不理会。
